name: Mango Overnight Oats with Turmeric and Chia Seeds
description: Mango Overnight Oats with Turmeric and Chia Seeds. Golden Overnight Oats with toasted oatmeal. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Soy-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup old fashioned oats (, use certified gluten-free if needed or use a gluten-free muesli of choice)
2 tbsp sunflower seeds or other seeds or chopped nuts (optional)
1/2 to 1  tsp  ground turmeric (, or use 1/2 inch peeled turmeric root)
1 tbsp sugar (, maple or sweetener of choice (or 3 dates))
Toppings: Fresh berries or mango or other chopped fruit (seeds, nuts)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the chia seeds in the water (or use orange juice). let sit to thicken for 15 mins, then spread at the bottom of the serving jars.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the chia seeds in the water (or use orange juice). let sit to thicken for 15 mins, then spread at the bottom of the serving jars.

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the oats in skillet over medium heat for 3 to 4 mins. Add the sunflower seeds or nuts half way through. You want to the oats to get just slightly toasty and nutty. (You can skip the roasting if you like to keep the oats and nuts untoasted). Add to the jars.
recipeInstructions.name: Toast the oats in skillet over medium heat for 3 to 4 mins. Add the sunflower seeds or nuts half way through. You want to the oats to get just slightly toasty and nutty. (You can skip the roasting if you like to keep the oats and nuts untoasted). Add to the jars.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mango with the non dairy milk, turmeric, salt and vanilla, sugar/sweetener until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the mango with the non dairy milk, turmeric, salt and vanilla, sugar/sweetener until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the mango mixture into the jars and mix lightly to combine with the oats.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mango mixture into the jars and mix lightly to combine with the oats.

recipeInstructions.text: Let the mixture chill overnight. Top with fresh fruits such as blueberries, raspberries, and other toppings such as coconut, chia seeds and serve.
